item.title: Simon Amstell: How the comedian is peeling away the layers of shame
item.description: The stand-up comedian and writer on how telling the truth on-stage and on-screen sets him free.

item.title: Top Gun and Mission: Impossible films delayed due to US Covid spike
item.description: Tom Cruise's movies are put on hold as studios fear a recent US Covid spike will deter cinemagoers.

item.title: Britney Spears: No charges over employee dispute allegation
item.description: No action is taken due to insufficient evidence and lack of injury to the employee, officials say.

item.title: Mikis Theodorakis, composer of Zorba the Greek, dies aged 96
item.description: Mikis Theodorakis was also a key figure of resistance to the Greek military junta of the 1970s.

item.title: Podcast host Joe Rogan says he has Covid
item.description: He caused controversy in April when he suggested young, healthy people did not need the vaccine.

item.title: Warning of film industry skills shortage in Wales
item.description: Forest Whitaker and Tom Hardy have filmed in Wales - but the sector says it needs people to help stars.

item.title: Ofcom clears ITV over Piers Morgan's Meghan comments on Good Morning Britain
item.description: TV watchdog Ofcom rejects a record 58,000 complaints about his criticism of the Duchess of Sussex.

item.title: Declan Donnelly: Men admit plot to steal presenter's car
item.description: The group of four admit they had planned to steal about Â£750,000 worth of high-value vehicles.

item.title: Winnie-the-Pooh: Collectable coins to mark bear's 95th anniversary
item.description: The Royal Mint commemorate the world's favourite fictional bear's 95th birthday with nine-piece set.

item.title: Scots to need vaccine passports for large events
item.description: People who have not been fully vaccinated will not be able to attend many sporting events, concerts or nightclubs.

item.title: Cheryl Cole podcast: BBC R&B series draws criticism
item.description: The BBC Sounds and Radio 2 commission has been criticised for not having a black host.

item.title: Fresh Prince of Bel-Air: Will Smith reveals who will play him in show reboot
item.description: Newcomer Jabari Banks will take on the role in the upcoming NBC Peacock reboot of the hit 1990s show.

item.title: Rick Edwards to replace Nicky Campbell on 5 Live Breakfast
item.description: Rick Edwards is known for TV programmes like T4 and the BBC game show Impossible.

item.title: Birmingham Hippodrome full audiences 'like coming home'
item.description: Nick Hayes says there is a "huge sense of gratitude" among the cast, who are "so happy" to be back.

item.title: Kabul make-up artist: 'Women like me are Taliban targets'
item.description: A make-up artist in hiding explains how much Afghanistan's beauty industry has meant to women.

item.title: Vigil: Submarine drama explores 'isolating and tense' life and death at sea
item.description: Suranne Jones and Martin Compston star in BBC One's Vigil, set on board a nuclear submarine.

item.title: Back to the mosh pit: What it means for super-fans
item.description: Live music is back - and for the most committed fans it's the return of an entire way of life.

item.title: Ryan Tedder: Classic songs are strangling new music
item.description: New bands don't have a chance because everyone is streaming Queen and ABBA, says the OneRepublic star.

item.title: Piers Morgan speaks after Ofcom clears ITV over Meghan comments
item.description: Piers Morgan has spoken out after Ofcom cleared ITV over his criticism of Meghan Markle on Good Morning Britain.

item.title: Daniel Mays: Anthony Hopkins 'way off the mark' about drama schools
item.description: Actor Daniel Mays says he "wholeheartedly" disagrees with Anthony Hopkinsâ views on drama schools.

item.title: Covid shielder gets private opera performance in back garden
item.description: Ceinwen Giles is shielding from Covid due to her cancer treatment, so an opera was brought to her garden.

item.title: Dave Grohl performs with Nandi Bushell, 11, at Foo Fighters gig
item.description: Nandi Bushell joins the American rock band on stage in Los Angeles.

item.title: Stormzy, Skepta and Aitch: Making beats for rap stars at 19
item.description: Chris Rich has made thousands from creating beats in the style of hip hop's elite.

item.title: Sabyasachi Mukherjee: Wanderlust collection was about India
item.description: Indian fashion designer Sabyasachi Mukherjee was criticised after he teamed up with high street retailer H&M.
